attributes.action: Support the reselling of sporting tickets and concert / show tickets subject to:
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Simple rules, the face value of the ticket is advertised. Full refund is given if concert / match / show is cancelled.
This will prevent underhand and black market selling of tickets and also promote those who supply tickets honestly where there is need.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
